div.p: This code system urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.285 defines many codes, but they are not represented here

description.value: Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) Procedure Codes

copyright.value: HCPCS codes are available at https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/Coding/HCPCSReleaseCodeSets/Alpha-Numeric-HCPCS.html. The link takes one to a list of files. The HCPCS ANWEB files include modifier and procedure codes. The target set for this Code System is the procedure codes from this file. The code set is owned by CMS and is available for use.
